name: Post Delta Notification
author: Michael George

sections.description: This plugin puts a “Subscribe” button to the bottom of posts so users can be notified when a post changes. Subscribed users will get an email that contains a link to the post. If they wish to no longer receive email notifications, the button at the bottom of the post will unsubscribe them.
sections.installation:
1. Upload post-delta-notification.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does it work with pages and/or custom post types?

It works with pages and posts and should work with custom types as well, though I haven’t tried.
